item.title: Autocad-1
item.author: michtintin
item.description: Autocad tutorials: Align & Scale Shortcut using coordinates for accuracy. 00:00-00:09 Introduction Hello, everyone. This video is about how to Scale and Align your drawing if you only have two coordinates. 00:10-00:16 Check default units. Check that the units are all in millimetres, or type “UNITS”, spacebar. 00:17-00:27 Attach reference image plan. Bring in the drawing with Reference Manager, “REF” spacebar. and then click attach and select your drawing. Check that the unit is in millimetres and then click OK
